code: @Manual{,   title = {cFreeze: No Freeze for Corn Harvest},   author = {Gino Beltran},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 1.0},   url = {https://github.com/gnbltrn/cFreeze/tree/main/cFreeze}, }

title: No Freeze for Corn Harvest
text: purpose cFreeze help corn seed growers understand potential risk freeze damage harvest time. cFreeze calculates percent occurrence temperatures zero degrees Celsius day year, given GPS coordinates location interest last 30-year historical weather data extracted Iowa Environmental Mesonet (IEM) closest location. cFreeze also calculates last day harvest given certain levels freeze risk summer months northern hemisphere (NH). See demonstration functionality details. learn IEM, follow link: https://mesonet.agron.iastate.edu/

title: No Freeze for Corn Harvest
text: following package needs installed loaded cFreeze able extract weather data directly IEM.

title: No Freeze for Corn Harvest
text: cFreeze can installed directly GitHub public repository using devtools package:
code: install.packages("devtools")  #if not installed already devtools::install.github("gnbltrn/cFreeze/cFreeze")  #Load cFreeze library(cFreeze)

title: No Freeze for Corn Harvest
text: cFreeze installed loaded, can use 5 functions independently:
code: #Returns the last day to harvest (after June, NH) with no historical risk of freezing. nofreeze(-118.607994, 41.659626) [1] "Sep-17"  #Returns the last day to harvest (after June, NH) with less than 10pct historical risk of freezing. freeze10(-118.607994, 41.659626) [1] "Oct-2"  #Returns the last day to harvest (after June, NH) with less than 20pct historical risk of freezing. freeze20(-118.607994, 41.659626) [1] "Oct-9"  #Returns the percent historical risk of freezing for a any day of the year.  freeze(-118.607994, 41.659626, 10, 30) [1] 43.33333  #Plots the percent each day of the year had temperatures below 0C. plotdaysB0(-118.607994, 41.659626)

what: Find the Percent Historical Freeze For Any Given Month and Day — freeze
title: Find the Percent Historical Freeze For Any Given Month and Day — freeze
text: Returns historical percent days freezing temperatures day year, based GPS coordinates 30-year weather data Iowa Environmental Mesonet (IEM). package need enter long, lat order. Note applications, Google maps, provide lat, long reverse order.  must apsimx package installed.

title: Find the Percent Historical Freeze For Any Given Month and Day — freeze
Find the Percent Historical Freeze For Any Given Month and Day — freeze
text: lon GPS longitude lat GPS latitude Month numeric values 1:12 Mday numeric values 1:31 given month, excluding Feb-29

what: Last Day To Harvest With 10pct Historical Freeze — freeze10
title: Last Day To Harvest With 10pct Historical Freeze — freeze10
text: Returns last day harvest 10pct history freezing temperatures, based GPS coordinates 30-year weather data Iowa Environmental Mesonet (IEM). package need enter long, lat order. Note applications, Google maps, provide lat, long reverse order.  must apsimx package installed.

title: Last Day To Harvest With 10pct Historical Freeze — freeze10
Last Day To Harvest With 10pct Historical Freeze — freeze10
text: lon GPS longitude lat GPS latitude
